content: free version of pattern viewable at https //www sweetsofties com/2025/11/no-sew-christmas-tree html this no-sew christmas tree is a fun crochet pattern featuring a tall fir tree with a tree skirt it is crocheted seamlessly in one piece making it a relaxing project to work up without having to do any sewing this mini tree is the perfect desk topper and decor for the winter holidays it doubles up as a pincushion inserted sewing pins will look like tiny ornaments this crochet tree looks beautiful as-is in its natural state but is also fun to decorate with mini accessories e g bows beads and buttons for ornaments glittery pipe cleaner or eyelash yarn for a garland and a dusting of glitter or powder for a snowy or frosted look a truly lovely product to sell at fall and winter craft fairs and markets **size** height 4 inches **materials** medium weight 4 yarn in desired colors i used hobbii s tea time christmas yarn 2 75mm crochet hook fiberfill stuffing scissors optional decorations such as mini bows beads buttons eyelash yarn or glittery pipecleaners glitter white powder etc **level** ★★★☆☆ intermediate requires familiarity with stitches used below and changing yarn colors **stitches used us terms ** fo = fasten_off yo = yarn over chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase insert 2 single_crochet in same st decrease = decrease single_crochet 2 sts together half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet blo = back loops only flo = front loops only *copyright notice this pattern
